Cooperated and communicated effectively with physicians to ensure client satisfaction and compliance with set standards. Conducted monthly patient case conferences, in-services and staff meetings to educate staff and facilitate good communication. Certified that equipment and supplies were properly maintained for quality patient care and safety. Identified process improvements in the day-to-day functioning of the department. Managed and directed fiscal operations, including planning budgets, authorizing expenditures, accounting, establishing service rates and coordinating financial reporting.
